title: [1.12.2-1.10][Combined Potions——组合药水]没状态?来一瓶!
txt_content:
本帖最后由 15253540 于 2020-3-4 18:28 编辑 

Combined Potions——组合药水没状态?来一瓶!Mod简介Ever get tired of filling up your inventory with different potions? Well now you don't have to!

This mod lets you craft potions with different effects together to make a single potion with multiple effects. It also works for splash potions, lingering potions and tipped arrows, and as of version 1.1 includes support for potions and arrows added by the Potion Core mod.

For more information and other small mods, please visit the Minecraft Forum thread:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/fo ... craft-mods/2803345.
简单的解释:
几幅图就能说明白这个小mod的作用





QQ截图20180305151320.png (25.13 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2018-3-5 15:30 上传





当有同种效果时,优先选最高级的,当级别一样时,会选择时间最长的(负面效果同理)

该mod可以防止Potion Core mod带来的药水病问题资源 Resource官方下载地址: 
Latest | 1.12.X-1.1 | 1.11.X-1.1 | 1.10.X-1.1
度盘:
无提取码(包含1.12.X-1.10.X)(2018/3/5更新)

官方更新日志:mod版本:1.1 | 对应游戏版本:1.12.X-1.10.X
v1.1
-Added support for PotionCore potions
-Added maxPotionEffects config option
-Included Russian translation by raspopov
-Included Chinese translation by Snownee
-Included Spanish translation by Dorzar

过往更新日志:暂无

replies.author: assyljk
replies.txt_content: 1.12.2服务器 运行后 玩家死亡1次后 无限死亡 不能打字

replies.author: x119
replies.txt_content: 感谢搬运！为什么没有看见12.2

replies.author: 我2我明白
replies.txt_content: 这玩意儿会吞瓶子，喝了合成药水只会返还一个玻璃瓶，虽然我也不缺那些玻璃就是啦

replies.author: Forgottenheart
replies.txt_content: 很方便的mod，有效增强但又没有太过离谱。

replies.author: 筚篥寒冷
replies.txt_content: 嗯很好，可以很快速的完成一些所需要的成就（滑稽）

replies.author: STRLeon
replies.txt_content: 状态没了？恶货吃个力量2

replies.author: 纯洁的小翁
replies.txt_content: 溜的飞起，必须支持一下！！！
